title: Graph Scroll
description: A javascript library that allows you to modify an svg using scrolling events as triggers

title: Strict Pomodoro
description: A chrome plugin that lets me improve my productivity by enforcing a 25/5 min (Pomodoro) workflow where you work distraction-free (blocks distracting websites) for 25 mins followed by 5 mins of break.

title: JSON Editor Online
description: A simple to use online JSON editor.

title: Inkscape
description: Free to use multi-platform SVG editor.

title: Dillinger
description: An online markdown editor that lets you edit and preview your markdown files in a rendered fashion.
